name: MAT_PIECEWISE_LINEAR_PLASTICITY
desc: Piecewise linear plasticity model commonly used for metals with multi-segment stress–strain curves.

name: MAT_JOHNSON_COOK
desc: Johnson–Cook model for metals at high strain rate and/or elevated temperature (impact/penetration).

name: MAT_CSCM (Continuous Surface Cap Model)
desc: Advanced concrete model with damage and rate effects; widely used for RC, blast, and impact simulations.

name: MAT_HYPERELASTIC_RUBBER (Mooney-Rivlin)
desc: Hyperelastic rubber/elastomer model based on Mooney–Rivlin; common for seals, tires, and pads.
